meanings.sent1: She is the tetchiest person in the office, always getting upset over small things.
meanings.sent2: The cat becomes tetchiest when you wake her up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: His tetchiest mood is like a grumpy bear in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The tetchiest customer at the store made everyone nervous with their constant complaints.
meanings.sent5: The tetchiest dog in the neighborhood barks at every passing car.

meanings.sent1: The tetchiest customer at the restaurant sent back their food three times.
meanings.sent2: She becomes tetchiest when someone interrupts her while she's working.
meanings.sent3: The tetchiest squirrel in the park chatters angrily at anyone who comes too close.
meanings.sent4: His tetchiest expression could make even the bravest person think twice before approaching him.
meanings.sent5: The tetchiest bird in the tree squawked loudly at anyone who passed by.
